file.name: parameters-flat.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.2"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Search example
  contact:
    name: Contact Name
    email: contact@example.com
    url: https://example.com/
servers:
  - url: http://example.com
tags:
  - name: search
    description: Search
paths:
  /search:
    get:
      summary: Search for pets
      operationId: search
      tags:
        - search
      parameters:
        - name: term
          in: query
          description: The term you want to search for
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: filter[tag]
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: array
        - name: filter[id]
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
        - name: filter[other]
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: How many items to return at one time (max 100)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
        - name: birthdate
          in: query
          description: Search for a pet born on this date
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: include
          in: query
          description: Relations you want to include
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            pattern: (parents|children)+(,(parents|children))*
      responses:
        "200":
          description: A paged array of pets
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pets"
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
  /info:
    get:
      summary: Get some info
      operationId: info
      tags:
        - search
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ok

components:
  schemas:
    Pets:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/Pet"
    Pet:
      $ref: "./components/schemas/pet.yaml#/Pet"
    Error:
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        message:
          type: string

Error: parse: paths: /search: get: operation "search": responses: 200: content: "application/json": schema: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/Pets": parse schema: item: parse schema: reference "#/components/schemas/Pet": parse schema: reference "./components/schemas/pet.yaml#/Pet": resolve reference "./components/schemas/pet.yaml#/Pet": invalid schema reference "./components/schemas/pet.yaml#/Pet"
